alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Miller; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Decatur, eastern Miller, southwestern Mitchell and southwestern Baker Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of West Bainbridge to 11 miles northeast of Bainbridge. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vada, Babcock, Hopeful, Hoggard Mill, Branchville, Cooktown, Bellview and Mimsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
